name: The Sweetest Game (DEMO)
description:
The Sweetest Game is a multi-level platformer where the player is a gumball attempting to consume ALL of the sweets. There are 20 various sweets and 3 bonus sugar cubes per level. 

This game was made as a project for a game design course by a beginning game designer and developer, Victoria Lane. The game is ready to play, but it is considered a "demo" because more levels and gameplay elements may be added to later version(s).

Please enjoy the game and feel free to leave feedback to encourage Victoria to continue with the game or to help her better her skills!
